eg.syntax

Class Coloring

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.syntax.Coloring

  • public class Coloring
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a SyntaxSearch, in which the Colorable is set and maybe changed depending on the language and which can be used to color text
    See Also:
    SyntaxSearch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coloring(javax.swing.text.StyledDocument doc, javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet normalSet)

      Colors text
      void setColorable(Languages lang)
      Selects a Colorable based on the language and assigns it to this SyntaxSearch.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coloring

        public Coloring(javax.swing.text.StyledDocument doc,
                javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet normalSet)
        Parameters:
        doc - the StyledDocument that contains the text to color
        normalSet - the SimpleAttributeSet that has the normal (black, plain) style

    • Method Detail

      • setColorable

        public void setColorable(Languages lang)
        Selects a Colorable based on the language and assigns it to this SyntaxSearch.
        Parameters:
        lang - a language in Languages

      • color

        public void color(java.lang.String text,
                  java.lang.String toColor,
                  int pos,
                  int posStart)
        Colors text
        Parameters:
        text - the entire text
        toColor - the part this is colored
        pos - the position where a change happened
        posStart - the position where toColor starts
        See Also:
        SyntaxSearch.color(String,String,int,int)
